author: Special Correspondent
text:
Cotton stock worth Rs. 2.11 crore was auctioned at the Konganapuram branch of the Tiruchengode Agricultural Producers Cooperative Marketing Society on Saturday.

While DCH cotton variety fetched a price between Rs. 5,590 and Rs. 6,370 per 100 kg bag, the PT variety fetched a price between Rs. 4,680 and Rs. 5,520 per bag. About 10,105 bags of cotton was auctioned for Rs. 2.11 crore, a release of the society said.
title: Cotton auctioned
